import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import {Form,Button,Col} from 'react-bootstrap' import { savePaymentMethod } from '../actions/cartAction' import CheckoutStep from '../components/CheckoutStep' const PaymentScreen = () => { const history = useNavigate(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const [paymentMethod,setPaymentMethod] = useState('paypal') if(!shippingAddress){ history('/shipping') }else{ dispatch(savePaymentMethod(paymentMethod)) history('/placeorder') } return ( <>

setPaymentMethod(e.target.value)}> setPaymentMethod(e.target.value)}>
) } export default PaymentScreen
